dict.acceptation: 恐慌，惊慌；（金融方面）大恐慌；成功；〈俚〉非常滑稽的人；

sent.orig: Interestingly, panic appears in many other languages besides English.
sent.trans: 有趣的是，panic（慌乱）这个词不仅出现在英语里，还出现在很多其他语言里。

sent.orig: Already the black instant of panic was half-forgotten.
sent.trans: 漆黑的恐惧早忘了一半。

sent.orig: I had panic attacks during rehearsal.
sent.trans: 彩排的时候我有过多次的恐慌。

sent.orig: This news release, the market once again plunged into panic, look at re-filled with air atmosphere.
sent.trans: 此消息一公布，市场再度陷入恐慌，看空气氛再度弥漫。
